titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to provide that none of the funds in the Employees' Compensation Fund shall be used to pay compensation, benefits, or expenses for individuals convicted of fraud or other violations in connection with benefits from such fund.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

bill.summary: 11/3/1993--Introduced. Amends Federal civil service law to provide for the forfeiture of all entitlement to benefits for injuries at work for individuals convicted of fraud or other violations in connection with such benefits.
